title: What is the other applicant’s relationship to {{ deceasedName }}?
hintText: Based on the information you have given us, there are other people entitled to inherit who you can apply with.
optionGrandchildHintText: This can only be through any of {{ deceasedName }}’s children that died before {{ deceasedName }}

relationshipToDeceased.required: Choose an option for your relationship to the person who died
